trans-unit.source: Provides utility methods that perform common tasks involving nodes in a visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 提供实用工具方法，用于执行涉及可视化树中的节点的常见任务。

trans-unit.source: Nodes in the visual tree can be either <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> objects.
trans-unit.target: 可视化树中的节点可以是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: Methods that are specific to a type of visual object are typed as either <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D>.
trans-unit.target: 特定于一种视觉对象的方法被类型化为其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: However, some methods in the VisualTreeHelper class can accept a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> value that represents either type of visual object.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以接受 VisualTreeHelper 类中的某些方法<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>表示其中任何一种视觉对象的值。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] supports programmatic access to several different tree structures of objects.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]支持以编程方式访问的对象的几种不同树结构。

trans-unit.source: Primarily, this is exposed as a visual tree and a logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 主要原因是，此名称公开为可视化树和逻辑树。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the logical tree is a more useful representation of the elements in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application, but conceptually the logical tree is implemented at a level beyond the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> class.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，逻辑树是中的元素的更多有用表示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]在超出<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>类</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>级别实现应用程序，但从概念上讲逻辑树

trans-unit.source: Unlike the visual tree, the logical tree can represent nonvisual data objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem>.
trans-unit.target: 与可视化树中，不同的逻辑树可以表示非可视化数据对象，如<xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the logical tree, see [Trees in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关逻辑树的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The logical tree also is supported by a similar utility method class, <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑树还支持一个类似的实用工具方法类， <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>.</xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> value for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref>值指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that contains the bitmap effect.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> ，其中包含的位图效果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectInput"></xref> value for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectInput"></xref>值指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that contains the bitmap effect input value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>包含位图效果的输入的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectInput"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectInput"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the cached representation of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定的缓存的表示<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CacheMode"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CacheMode"></xref> for.

trans-unit.source: The for reference.
trans-unit.target: The for reference.

trans-unit.source: Returns the child visual object from the specified collection index within a specified parent.
trans-unit.target: 返回子 visual 对象从指定的父项中的指定的集合索引。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount%2A> method to determine the total number of child elements of a parent visual.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount%2A>方法来确定父可视对象的子元素的总数。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of `reference` can represent either a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> object, which is why the common base type <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> is used here as a parameter type.
trans-unit.target: 值`reference`可以表示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D>对象，这正是公共基类型<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>使用此处作为参数类型。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: The parent visual, referenced as a <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 父可视对象，作为引用<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index that represents the child visual that is contained by `reference`.
trans-unit.target: 表示子视觉对象所包含的索引`reference`。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the child visual object.
trans-unit.target: 子 visual 对象的索引值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of children that the specified visual object contains.
trans-unit.target: 返回的包含指定的视觉对象的子级的个数。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetChild%2A> method to retrieve a specified child of a parent visual.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetChild%2A>方法来检索父可视对象的指定的子。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of `reference` can represent either a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> object, which is why the common base type <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> is used here as a parameter type.
trans-unit.target: 值`reference`可以表示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D>对象，这正是公共基类型<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>使用此处作为参数类型。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: The parent visual that is referenced as a <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 作为引用的父可视<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of child visuals that the parent visual contains.
trans-unit.target: 父可视对象包含的子视觉对象数。

trans-unit.source: Return the clip region of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的剪辑区域<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>作为<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> whose clip region value is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>返回其剪辑区域值。

trans-unit.source: The clip region value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> returned as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 剪辑区域值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>作为返回<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cached bounding box rectangle for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的缓存边界框矩形<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetDescendantBounds%2A> method to return the union of all the content bounding boxes for all the descendants of a 3D visual object, which includes the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> itself.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetDescendantBounds%2A>方法返回的所有内容边界框的 3D visual 对象，其中包括的所有子代联合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D>本身。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetDescendantBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The 3D visual whose bounding box value is computed.
trans-unit.target: 计算的 3D 可视对象的边界框值。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box 3D rectangle for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 边界框 3D 矩形<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cached bounding box rectangle for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的缓存边界框矩形<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetDescendantBounds%2A> method to return the union of all the content bounding boxes for all the descendants of a visual object, which includes the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> itself.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetDescendantBounds%2A>方法返回的所有内容边界框的 visual 对象，其中包括的所有子代联合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>本身。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetDescendantBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> whose bounding box value is computed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>计算其边界框值。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box rectangle for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 边界框矩形<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the union of all the content bounding boxes for all the descendants of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref>, which includes the content bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的所有内容为所有的后代中的指定边界框的联合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref>，其中包括内容边界框<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetContentBounds%2A> method to return the cached bounding box rectangle for a 3D visual object.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetContentBounds%2A>方法以返回 3D 视觉对象中缓存的边界框矩形。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The 3D visual whose bounding box value for all descendants is computed.
trans-unit.target: 计算的 3D 可视对象的所有后代其边界框值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding box 3D rectangle for the 3D visual.
trans-unit.target: 返回的三维可视对象的边界框 3D 矩形。

trans-unit.source: Returns the union of all the content bounding boxes for all the descendants of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>, which includes the content bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的所有内容边界框的所有后代联合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>，其中包括内容边界框<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetContentBounds%2A> method to return the cached bounding box rectangle for a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetContentBounds%2A>方法来返回已缓存边界框<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>矩形</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.GetContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> whose bounding box value for all descendants is computed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>计算所有后代其边界框值。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box rectangle for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的边界框矩形<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the DPI information at which this Visual is measured and rendered.
trans-unit.target: 获取此视觉对象是测量并呈现的 DPI 信息。

trans-unit.source: The Visual target object.
trans-unit.target: Visual 目标对象。

trans-unit.source: A DPIScale value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DPIScale 值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the drawing content of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的绘制内容<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> whose drawing content is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>返回其绘制内容。

trans-unit.source: The drawing content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> returned as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 绘制内容<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>作为返回<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the edge mode of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> as an <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的边缘模式<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>作为<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The edge mode value determines how the edges of non-text primitives are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 边缘模式值确定非文本基元的边缘的呈现方式。

trans-unit.source: |Edge mode value|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode>|Render edges of non-text primitives as aliased edges.| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode>|No edge mode is specified.
trans-unit.target: |边缘模式值 |说明 | |---------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode>|呈现为锯齿边缘的非文本基元的边缘。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode>|指定无边缘模式。</xref:System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode>

trans-unit.source: Do not change the current edge mode that is applied to non-text primitives.|
trans-unit.target: 不要更改当前应用于非文本基元的边缘模式。 |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> whose edge mode value is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>返回其边缘模式值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode"></xref> value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode"></xref> value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bitmap effect for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的位图效果<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> to get the bitmap effect for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>若要获取的位图效果。

trans-unit.source: The applied to reference.
trans-unit.target: The applied to reference.

trans-unit.source: Returns the offset of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的偏移量<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The returned offset value is relative to the parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量的返回的值是相对于的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>父级

trans-unit.source: If you want to return an offset value that is not relative to the parent of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.TransformToAncestor%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要返回不是相对于的父级的偏移量的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.TransformToAncestor%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.TransformToAncestor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> whose offset is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>返回其偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> that represents the offset value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"> </xref>表示的偏移量的值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the opacity of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的不透明度<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the opacity is expressed as a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 不透明度的值表示为介于 0 和 1 之间的值。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates that the element is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the element is completely opaque.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0，则表示该元素完全透明，如果值为 1 指示元素是完全不透明。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.5 indicates that the element is 50 percent opaque.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 0.5 表示该元素为 50%不透明。

trans-unit.source: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, and values greater than 1 are treated as 1.
trans-unit.target: 值小于 0 将被视为 0，而大于 1 的值将被视为 1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> whose opacity value is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>返回其不透明度值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> that represents the opacity value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref:System.Double>表示的不透明度值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> value that represents the opacity mask of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>值，该值表示的不透明蒙<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The opacity mask is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> that is applied to any alpha-channel masking for the rendered content of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.
trans-unit.target: 不透明蒙版在于<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>，应用于此<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>所呈现内容的任何 alpha 通道蒙</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> whose opacity mask value is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>返回其不透明度掩码值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that represents the opacity mask value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>表示的不透明度掩码值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> value that represents the parent of the visual object.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>表示的视觉对象的父项的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of `reference` can represent either a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> object.
trans-unit.target: 值`reference`可以表示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: The visual whose parent is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回其父视觉对象。

trans-unit.source: The parent of the visual.
trans-unit.target: 视觉对象的父级。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref>值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.TransformToAncestor%2A> method to return a transform value for the ancestor of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用该<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.TransformToAncestor%2A>方法返回的一种<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>祖先的转换值</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.TransformToAncestor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns a valid transform.
trans-unit.target: 此方法始终返回一个有效的转换。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.TransformToAncestor%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.TransformToAncestor%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.TransformToAncestor%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[VisualSnippets#VisualSnippet3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/visualsnippets/window1.xaml.vb#visualsnippet3)] [!code-cs[VisualSnippets#VisualSnippet3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/VisualSnippets/Window1.xaml.cs#visualsnippet3)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[VisualSnippets #VisualSnippet3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/visualsnippets/window1.xaml.vb#visualsnippet3)][!code-cs[VisualSnippets #VisualSnippet3 ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/VisualSnippets/Window1.xaml.cs#visualsnippet3)]

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> whose transform value is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>返回其转换值。

trans-unit.source: The transform value of the , or if reference does not have a transform defined.
trans-unit.target: 转换值 ，或如果 reference 没有一个定义的转换。

trans-unit.source: Returns an X-coordinate (vertical) guideline collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回 X 坐标 （垂直） 准线集合。

trans-unit.source: Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels.
trans-unit.target: 像素对齐是内容的布局固定，以便对象边缘呈现特定于设备的像素的过程。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]图形系统使用独立于设备的单位来启用分辨率和设备独立。

trans-unit.source: Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] setting.
trans-unit.target: 使用系统的自动缩放每个设备无关的像素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]设置。

trans-unit.source: This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware.
trans-unit.target: 这提供了[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序正确缩放为不同[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]设置并自动使应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-感知。

trans-unit.source: However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]独立性可能会由于抗锯齿的不规则的边缘呈现出。

trans-unit.source: These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels.
trans-unit.target: 当边缘的位置位于中间设备像素，而不是设备像素之间，会发生这些项目，通常被视为分明，还是"软"边缘。

trans-unit.source: To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此问题，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供一种方法与设备像素为单位通过像素对齐，"对齐"可视化树中的对象边缘消除产生抗锯齿的软边缘。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> whose X-coordinate guideline collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>返回其 X 坐标准线集合。

trans-unit.source: The X-coordinate guideline collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: X 坐标准线集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Y-coordinate (horizontal) guideline collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Y 坐标 （水平） 准线集合。

trans-unit.source: Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels.
trans-unit.target: 像素对齐是内容的布局固定，以便对象边缘呈现特定于设备的像素的过程。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]图形系统使用独立于设备的单位来启用分辨率和设备独立。

trans-unit.source: Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] setting.
trans-unit.target: 使用系统的自动缩放每个设备无关的像素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]设置。

trans-unit.source: This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware.
trans-unit.target: 这提供了[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序正确缩放为不同[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]设置并自动使应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-感知。

trans-unit.source: However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]独立性可能会由于抗锯齿的不规则的边缘呈现出。

trans-unit.source: These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels.
trans-unit.target: 当边缘的位置位于中间设备像素，而不是设备像素之间，会发生这些项目，通常被视为分明，还是"软"边缘。

trans-unit.source: To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此问题，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供一种方法与设备像素为单位通过像素对齐，"对齐"可视化树中的对象边缘消除产生抗锯齿的软边缘。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> whose Y-coordinate guideline collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>返回其 Y 坐标准线集合。

trans-unit.source: The Y-coordinate guideline collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Y 坐标准线集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the topmost <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> object of a hit test by specifying a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的最顶层<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>通过指定的命中测试的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit%2A> property of the return value represents the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> object that was hit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit%2A>属性的返回值表示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>命中对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> </xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible for a hit test that starts in a 2D visual tree to return <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult>, which is a 3D hit test result object.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 可能的命中测试返回二维可视化树中启动<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult>，这是一个三维命中的测试结果对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: Hit testing that starts in a 2D visual tree seamlessly extends into any defined 3D visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 命中测试二维的可视化树中的启动无缝地延伸至任何定义的 3D 可视化树。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> to hit test.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>要进行命中测试。

trans-unit.source: The point value to hit test against.
trans-unit.target: 要进行命中测试的点值。

trans-unit.source: The hit test result of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>, returned as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 命中的测试结果<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>、 作为返回<xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult"></xref>类型。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a hit test on the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref>, with caller-defined <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterCallback"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback"></xref> methods.
trans-unit.target: 启动对指定命中的测试<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref>，使用调用方定义<xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterCallback"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback"></xref>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `filterCallback` parameter can be `null`, in which case, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: `filterCallback`参数可以为`null`，在这种情况下，它将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If `filterCallback` is not `null`, it is invoked before `resultCallback`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`filterCallback`不`null`之前, 调用`resultCallback`。

trans-unit.source: `resultCallback` cannot be `null`.
trans-unit.target: `resultCallback`不能为`null`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible for a hit test that starts in a 2D visual tree to return <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult>, which is a 3D hit test result object.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 可能的命中测试返回二维可视化树中启动<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult>，这是一个三维命中的测试结果对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: Hit testing that starts in a 2D visual tree seamlessly extends into any defined 3D visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 命中测试二维的可视化树中的启动无缝地延伸至任何定义的 3D 可视化树。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref> to hit test.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref>要进行命中测试。

trans-unit.source: The method that represents the hit test filter callback value.
trans-unit.target: 表示命中的测试筛选回调值的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method that represents the hit test result callback value.
trans-unit.target: 表示命中的测试结果回调值的方法。

trans-unit.source: The 3D parameter value to hit test against.
trans-unit.target: 要命中测试的 3D 参数值。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a hit test on the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>, with caller-defined <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterCallback"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback"></xref> methods.
trans-unit.target: 启动对指定命中的测试<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>，使用调用方定义<xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterCallback"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback"></xref>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `filterCallback` parameter can be `null`, in which case it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: `filterCallback`参数可以为`null`，在这种情况下它将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If `filterCallback` is not `null`, it is invoked before `resultCallback`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`filterCallback`不`null`之前, 调用`resultCallback`。

trans-unit.source: `resultCallback` cannot be `null`.
trans-unit.target: `resultCallback`不能为`null`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible for a hit test that starts in a 2D visual tree to return <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult>, which is a 3D hit test result object.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 可能的命中测试返回二维可视化树中启动<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult>，这是一个三维命中的测试结果对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: Hit testing that starts in a 2D visual tree seamlessly extends into any defined 3D visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 命中测试二维的可视化树中的启动无缝地延伸至任何定义的 3D 可视化树。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> to hit test.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>要进行命中测试。

trans-unit.source: The method that represents the hit test filter callback value.
trans-unit.target: 表示命中的测试筛选回调值的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method that represents the hit test result callback value.
trans-unit.target: 表示命中的测试结果回调值的方法。

trans-unit.source: The parameter value to hit test against.
trans-unit.target: 要命中测试的参数值。

trans-unit.source: Updates the DPI information of a Visual.
trans-unit.target: 更新视觉对象的 DPI 信息。

trans-unit.source: It can only be called on a Visual without a parent.
trans-unit.target: 它只能调用在无父视觉对象上。

trans-unit.source: A Visual object target.
trans-unit.target: 视觉对象目标。

trans-unit.source: DPI information for the target Visual.
trans-unit.target: 目标 Visual 的 DPI 信息。
